```template
effects.starField.startScreenEffect()
let mySprite = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . . . . 9 9 . . . . . . .
    . . . . . . 9 . . 9 . . . . . .
    . . . . . . 9 . . 9 . . . . . .
    . . . . . 9 . 9 9 . 9 . . . . .
    . . . . . 9 . 9 9 . 9 . . . . .
    . . . . 9 . 9 9 9 9 . 9 . . . .
    . . . . 9 . 9 9 9 9 . 9 . . . .
    . . . 9 . 9 9 9 9 9 9 . 9 . . .
    . . . 9 . 9 . . . . 9 . 9 . . .
    . . 9 . 9 9 . 9 9 . 9 9 . 9 . .
    . . 9 . 9 9 . . . . 9 9 . 9 . .
    . 9 . 9 9 9 . 9 9 9 9 9 9 . 9 .
    . 9 . 9 9 9 . 9 9 9 9 9 9 . 9 .
    9 . 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 . 9
    9 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 9
    9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9
`, SpriteKind.Player)
controller.moveSprite(mySprite)
mySprite.setFlag(SpriteFlag.StayInScreen, true)

controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    let projectile = sprites.createProjectileFromSprite(img`
3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3
3 . . . . . . 3
3 . 3 3 3 3 . 3
3 . 3 . . 3 . 3
3 . 3 . . 3 . 3
3 . 3 3 3 3 . 3
3 . . . . . . 3
3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3
    `, mySprite, 0, -70)
    projectile.startEffect(effects.fire);
})
```

```ghost
scene.cameraShake(4, 500)
```

Ch√∫ng c√≥ th·ªÉ l√† ƒë√° h·∫£i v·∫≠t, m·∫£nh v·ª•n ph√≥ng x·∫° ho·∫∑c c√° m·∫≠p kh√¥ng gian t·ª©c gi·∫≠n!

## B∆∞·ªõc 1

**üëæT·∫°o k·∫ª th√π r∆°i t·ª´ tr√™n tr·ªùi xu·ªëng kh√¥ng? üëæ**

H√£y th√™m m·ªôt s·ªë kh·ªëi code ƒë·ªÉ th·∫£ m·ªôt k·∫ª th√π v·ªÅ ph√≠a t√†u m·ªói gi√¢y ho·∫∑c nh∆∞ v·∫≠y.

---
 
üî≤ Th√™m m·ªôt kh·ªëi code``||game:on game update every [500] ms||`` 

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi ƒë·ªëi s·ªë cu·ªëi c√πng th√†nh **1000** [__*ms*__](#millis "milliseconds...aka 1/1000 of a second") 
(oho·∫∑c ch·ªçn **1s** gi√¢y t·ª´ menu th·∫£ xu·ªëng)    
<br/>

```blocks
game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
})
```

## B∆∞·ªõc 2

üî≤ Trong ph·∫ßn ``||sprites:Sprites||`` t√¨m kh·ªëi 
``||variables:set [projectile2] to projectile [ ] from side with vx [50] vy [50]||``
v√† k√©o v√†o kh·ªëi code l·ªõn **on game update**.

üî≤ Nh·∫•p v√†o gi√° tr·ªã ``||variables:[projectile2]||`` b√™n trong kh·ªëi m·ªõi v√†
ch·ªçn "Rename variable..." ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·ªïi t√™n.

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi t√™n bi·∫øn th√†nh ``||variables:myEnemy||`` ƒë·ªÉ ch√∫ng ta bi·∫øt r·∫±ng ƒë√≥ l√† k·∫ª th√π.  
<br/> 
<br/>
```blocks
let myEnemy: Sprite = null
game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
    // @highlight
    myEnemy = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
        `, 50, 50)
})
```

## B∆∞·ªõc 3
**üéÜ H√£y cho k·∫ª th√π di chuy·ªÉn theo h∆∞·ªõng ƒë√∫ng üéÜ**

---

üî≤ Nh·∫•p v√†o h√¨nh vu√¥ng m√†u x√°m b√™n trong kh·ªëi m·ªõi ƒë·ªÉ thi·∫øt k·∫ø k·∫ª th√π c·ªßa b·∫°n
(ho·∫∑c ch·ªçn m·ªôt trong s·ªë ƒë√≥ t·ª´ th∆∞ vi·ªán **galery**).

üî≤ ƒêi·ªÅu ch·ªânh c√°c gi√° tr·ªã **vx** v√† **vy** c·ªßa **myEnemy** cho ƒë·∫øn khi
c√°c h√¨nh m·ªõi c·ªßa b·∫°n ƒëang r∆°i th·∫≥ng xu·ªëng b√™n c·∫°nh m√†n h√¨nh. 


```blocks
let myEnemy: Sprite = null
game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
    // @highlight
    myEnemy = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2
        2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2
        2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . . . . 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . . . 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . . 2 . 2 . . . . 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . . 2 2 . . . . . . .
        `, 0, 50)
})
```

## B∆∞·ªõc 4

K·∫ª th√π kh√¥ng th·ªÉ g√¢y ra v·ª• n·ªï t√†u n·∫øu ch√∫ng ƒë·ªÅu ·ªü ngo√†i l·ªÅ,
v√¨ v·∫≠y h√£y th√™m m·ªôt ch√∫t b·∫•t ng·ªù b·∫±ng c√°ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng [__*random numbers*__](#randos "numbers appearing seemingly without a predictable pattern") .

---


üî≤ K√©o m·ªôt kh·ªëi code``||sprites:set [mySprite] [x] to [0]||`` v√†o cu·ªëi c·ªßa
kh·ªëi **on game update**.  

üî≤ ƒê·ªÉ ch·∫Øc ch·∫Øn r·∫±ng ch√∫ng ta ƒëang t√°c ƒë·ªông v√†o ƒë√∫ng nh√¢n v·∫≠t,
s·ª≠ d·ª•ng menu th·∫£ xu·ªëng trong kh·ªëi m·ªõi ƒë·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi ``||variables:mySprite||`` to ``||variables:myEnemy||``.

üî≤ Ch·ªçn m·ªôt [__*x*__](#setX " v·ªã tr√≠ ngang)  ng·∫´u nhi√™n cho k·∫ª th√π, s·ª≠ d·ª•ng m·ªôt kh·ªëi code 
``||Math:pick random [0] to [10]||`` t·ª´ ``||Math:Math||``.
K·∫øt n·ªëi n√≥ ƒë·ªÉ thay th·∫ø **0** trong kh·ªëi code **set mySprite x**.

üî≤ Cu·ªëi c√πng, c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ƒë·ªëi s·ªë t·ªëi thi·ªÉu c·ªßa kh·ªëi code 
``||Math:pick random [0] to [10]||`` th√†nh **5** v√† ƒë·ªëi s·ªë t·ªëi ƒëa th√†nh **155**. 

---

**G·ª£i √Ω**: M√†n h√¨nh m√°y gi·∫£ l·∫≠p c√≥ chi·ªÅu r·ªông l√† 160px,
v√¨ v·∫≠y b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ l√†m cho k·∫ª th√π c·ªßa b·∫°n r∆°i ·ªü b·∫•t k·ª≥ n∆°i n√†o gi·ªØa 0 v√† 160
v√† v·∫´n c√≥ th·ªÉ nh√¨n th·∫•y ch√∫ng.

```blocks
let myEnemy: Sprite = null
game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
    myEnemy = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2
        2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2
        2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . . . . 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . . . 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . . 2 . 2 . . . . 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . . 2 2 . . . . . . .
        `, 0, 50)

    // @highlight
    myEnemy.x = randint(5, 155)
})
```


## B∆∞·ªõc 5

C√≥ th·ªÉ b·∫°n mu·ªën th√™m nhi·ªÅu lo·∫°i k·∫ª th√π kh√°c nhau r∆°i t·ª´ tr√™n tr·ªùi xu·ªëng.
Ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o r·∫±ng t·∫•t c·∫£ ch√∫ng ƒë·ªÅu c√≥ c√πng m·ªôt hi·ªáu ·ª©ng b·∫±ng c√°ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√πng m·ªôt ch·ªßng lo·∫°i
"**Enemy**".

---

üî≤ K√©o m·ªôt kh·ªëi ``||sprites:set [mySprite] kind to [Player]||`` v√†o d∆∞·ªõi c√πng c·ªßa
kh·ªëi ch√≠nh **on game update**. 

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi ``||variables:mySprite||`` th√†nh ``||variables:myEnemy||``, sau ƒë√≥ ch·ªçn 
 ``||sprites:Enemy||`` th√†nh lo·∫°i.  
 <br/>


```blocks
let myEnemy: Sprite = null
game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
    myEnemy = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2
        2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2
        2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . . . . 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . 2 . 2 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . . . 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . .
        . . . 2 . 2 . . . . 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . 2 . 2 2 2 2 . 2 . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . 2 . 2 2 . 2 . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . 2 . . 2 . . . . . .
        . . . . . . . 2 2 . . . . . . . 
        `, 0, 50)
    myEnemy.x = randint(5, 155)
    //@highlight
    myEnemy.setKind(SpriteKind.Enemy)
})
```


## Step 6


**üí• ƒê·∫øn l√∫c t·∫°o h√†nh vi cho k·∫ª th√π üí•**

ƒê·ªÉ t·∫°o th√™m s·ª± h·ª©ng th√∫ cho tr√≤ ch∆°i, h√£y t·∫°o m·ªôt s·ª± ki·ªán khi m·ªôt k·∫ª th√π va ch·∫°m v·ªõi t√†u c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta.

---


üî≤ K√©o m·ªôt kh·ªëi code ``||sprites:on [sprite] of kind [Player] overlaps [othersprite] of kind [Player]||`` 
v√†o m√†n h√¨nh ch√≠nh

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi ``||variables:Player||`` th√†nh ``||variables:Enemy||``.

---

**M·∫πo**: ƒê·ª´ng c·ªë g·∫Øng thay ƒë·ªïi "sprite" ‚Üí "mySprite" ho·∫∑c "otherSprite" ‚Üí "myEnemy".
C√°c ƒë·ªëi s·ªë "sprite" v√† "otherSprite" ·ªü ƒë√¢y m√¥ t·∫£ hai lo·∫°i sprite chung tr√™n m√†n h√¨nh
(kh√¥ng ph·∫£i l√† c√°c t·∫°o v·∫≠t c·ª• th·ªÉ m√† ch√∫ng ta ƒë√£ ƒë·∫∑t t√™n tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥.)

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Enemy, function (sprite, otherSprite) {

})
```

## B∆∞·ªõc 7

Khi k·∫ª th√π va ch·∫°m v·ªõi t√†u,
ch√∫ng ta mu·ªën n√≥ gi·∫£m m·ªôt m·∫°ng s·ªëng... r·ªìi bi·∫øn m·∫•t. 

---


üî≤ K√©o m·ªôt kh·ªëi code ``||info:change life by [-1]||`` t·ª´ ph·∫ßn ``||info:Info||`` v√†o kh·ªëi l·ªõn
**on player overlaps enemy**. 
ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y lo·∫°i b·ªè m·ªôt m·∫°ng s·ªëng t·ª´ ng∆∞·ªùi ch∆°i m·ªói khi b·ªã k·∫ª th√π ƒë√°nh.

üî≤ T√¨m kh·ªëi code ``||sprites:destroy [mySprite] ‚äï||`` v√† k√©o n√≥ xu·ªëng d∆∞·ªõi kh·ªëi tr∆∞·ªõc.

üî≤ƒê·ªÉ cho kh·ªëi code **destroy** ·∫£nh h∆∞·ªüng ƒë·∫øn k·∫ª th√π ch·∫°m v√†o thuy·ªÅn c·ªßa m√¨nh, 
·∫•n v√†o ``||variables:otherSprite||``t·ª´ **overlaps** v√† k√©o n√≥ xu·ªëng thay th·∫ø ph·∫ßn 
``||variables:mySprite||`` t·ª´ ``||sprites:destroy [mySprite] ‚äï||``.
![Grabbing variable from block](/static/skillmap/space/give-var.gif "So that's how you do that!")

---

**M·∫πo**: Nh·∫•n ‚äï tr√™n kh·ªëi ``||sprites:destroy [otherSprite] ‚äï||`` ƒë·ªÉ c√≥
m·ªôt menu hi·ªáu ·ª©ng hi·ªÉn th·ªã khi k·∫ª th√π c·ªßa b·∫°n b·ªã ti√™u di·ªát!

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Enemy, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    info.changeLifeBy(-1)
    otherSprite.destroy(effects.spray, 500)
})
```

## B∆∞·ªõc 8

**üåç ƒê·∫øn l√∫c c·ª©u th·∫ø gi·ªõi üåè**

Th√™m m·ªôt **overlap** kh√°c s·∫Ω gi√∫p c√°c ƒë·∫°n ƒë·∫°o c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta
ti√™u di·ªát k·∫ª th√π c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta khi va ch·∫°m v·ªõi ch√∫ng.

---


üî≤ K√©o m·ªôt kh·ªëi code``||sprites:on [sprite] of kind [Player] overlaps [othersprite] of kind [Player]||`` kh√°c v√†o m√†n h√¨nh ch√≠nh. 

üî≤ Thay ƒë·ªïi ch·ªßng lo·∫°i ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n th√†nh ``||sprites:Enemy||`` v√† ch·ªßng lo·∫°i th·ª© hai th√†nh
``||sprites:Projectile||``. 

üî≤ B√™n trong, th√™m hai kh·ªëi code ``||sprites:destroy [mySprite] ‚äï||`` v√† sau ƒë√≥ thay ƒë·ªïi c√°c ƒë·ªëi s·ªë
ƒë·ªÉ ph√° h·ªßy k·∫ª th√π(``||variables:sprite||``) v√† c√πng m·ªôt l√∫c kh√°c ph√° hu·ª∑ ƒë·∫°n(``||variables:otherSprite||``).

---

**M·∫πo**: ƒê·ª´ng qu√™n nh·∫•n **‚äï** tr√™n kh·ªëi **destroy** ƒë·ªÉ c√≥
m·ªôt s·ªë hi·ªáu ·ª©ng ngo·∫°n m·ª•c khi vi√™n ƒë·∫°n c·ªßa b·∫°n va ch·∫°m!

```blocks
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Enemy, SpriteKind.Projectile, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    sprite.destroy(effects.bubbles, 500)
    otherSprite.destroy(effects.smiles, 500)
})
```

## Ho√†n th√†nh 

**Ch√∫c m·ª´ng B·∫°n**

B√¢y gi·ªù b·∫°n ƒë√£ c√≥ m·ªôt lo·∫°t k·∫ª th√π ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß ƒë·ªÉ chi·∫øn ƒë·∫•u!
ƒê·ª´ng qu√™n th·ª≠ tr√≤ ch∆°i c·ªßa b·∫°n tr√™n game m√¥ ph·ªèng tr∆∞·ªõc khi nh·∫•p v√†o "Done".

Khi b·∫°n ƒë√£ c√≥ tr√≤ ch∆°i nh∆∞ mong mu·ªën, nh·∫•p v√†o n√∫t "Done" ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªü l·∫°i b·∫£n ƒë·ªì v√† ch·ªçn ph·∫ßn k·∫ø ti·∫øp.
